short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch pure YouTube videos without any ads & distractions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Add-on lets you watch YouTube videos without any ads, comments and all the other distractions.

* Everything but the pure video is removed
	* no display ads
	* no annoying pre-roll ads (what most other ad blockers struggle with)
	* no comments
	* no distractions
* Easy to install, no configuration
* Minimal permissions and resource consumption
* Return to 'Normal view' whenever you want
* 100% free - 100% private
